# Copilot Instructions for EstudIA

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
EstudIA is a React-based platform for generating personalized exams using AI. The application helps students prepare for their exams by allowing them to upload course content and generate interactive exams with multiple choice, true/false, and open questions.

## Key Features
- Upload course materials (documents, PDFs, text)
- Generate AI-powered exams with different question types
- Interactive exam taking experience
- Automatic grading and scoring
- Progress tracking and analytics
- User authentication and course management

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React with TypeScript
- UI Library: Material-UI (MUI)
- Routing: React Router DOM
- Charts: Recharts
- HTTP Client: Axios
- Build Tool: Vite

## Code Style Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Material-UI design patterns
- Use functional components with hooks
- Implement responsive design principles
- Write clean, well-documented code
- Use meaningful component and variable names in Spanish when appropriate
